title: The Eyes of Nye
overview: Bill Nye, most widely known as the zany host of ‘Bill Nye the Science Guy', a show geared towards exposing young viewers to all different forms of science, is back with a new series aimed at a more mature audience. In his new series, The Eyes of Nye, Bill explores some of today's most controversial topics as well as taking a look at everyday science. He incorporates a comedic approach, similar to that of ‘Science Guy', to tackle some serious issues and educate his audience in a very straight forward manner.
